BadgeDetail.Name: Wheels & Tyres I
BadgeDetail.Description: Employer: This badge demonstrates the earner has demonstrated the fundamentals of wheel and tyre knowledge including damage, sizes and pressure. It also demonstrates knowledge of wheel bolt torque.

Task.Title: Tyre fundamentals
Task.Body: Upload evidence describing how to size a tyre, inspect a tyre for damage and how to assess a tyre against legal requirements.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload evidence describing how to size a tyre, inspect a tyre for damage and how to assess a tyre against legal requirements.
Task.TextileBody: Upload evidence describing how to size a tyre, inspect a tyre for damage and how to assess a tyre against legal requirements.

Task.Title: Feel the pressure
Task.Body: Upload evidence identifying correct tyre pressure, inflating a tyre to that pressure, and tighten wheel bolts to the correct torque.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload evidence identifying correct tyre pressure, inflating a tyre to that pressure, and tighten wheel bolts to the correct torque.
Task.TextileBody: Upload evidence identifying correct tyre pressure, inflating a tyre to that pressure, and tighten wheel bolts to the correct torque.
